formula: E.g.f. satisfies A' = exp(x) A - 1.Recurrence : a(1)=0, a(2)=1, for n>2, a(n)=1+sum(j=2, n-1, binomial(n-1, j)*a(j)) - _Jon Perry_, Apr 26 2005
mathematica: a[0] = 1; a[1] = 0; a[n_] := a[n] = 1 + Sum[Binomial[n-1, j]*a[j], {j, 2, n-1}]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 22}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Oct 08 2013, after Jon Perry *)
author: Joe K. Crump (joecr(AT)carolina.rr.com)
